title: Man killed over land dispute in Mirsarai
body: A man was killed allegedly by his nephew over a land dispute in Mirsarai upazila of Chattogram yesterday. The deceased, Abul Kalam, 55, died as his nephew Helal Uddin hit him with a brick. The incident occurred in the morning in Uttar Sonapahar area of Jorargonj union, according to police. There was a longstanding land dispute between Abul Kalam and Helal Uddin, said police and local sources. Yesterday morning, they got into an altercation, at one stage of which Helal struck Kalam with a brick, leaving him severely injured. He was immediately taken to the upazila health complex, before being shifted to Chattogram Medical College Hospital, where the on-duty doctor pronounced him dead. Helal has been on the run since the incident. Police said efforts are on to nab him, said Kazi Nazmul Haque, officer-in-charge of Jorargonj Police Station.
